ive been going through my list of games to find games ive played but never left a review for  rock of ages actually has a ton of playtime on a phone from somewhere in time  i liked it  i dont think it really was amazing on pc but for what it is worth it is a decent game

this has no right being as fun as it is its a bit choppy at times and i had a visual bug throughout the entire game the health bar being a giant square but otherwise pretty fun will get into 2 and 3 eventually for sure

note sometimes you have to test out some different settings to get the game to run without crashing but it should eventually work on any system despite its age  rock of ages never gets old the rolling segments are frustrating but rewarding and the defense part genuinely has interesting strategy despite being over a decade old the game still feels extremely fresh if you are like me last year and wondering whether to pick it up during the summer sale do it you wont regret it

the title of the game says it all  you play a rockof ages  in essence its a tower defense game with some very special features funny humor if you like monty python and black humor in particular  sometimes also blunt humor paired with strategy planning and dexterity  you have a good time if you play the single story mode once a rather short playing time was exactly the right choice here  the real fun begins in multiplayer  my imdb rating 710
its a fun and funny game the humor is great i recommend
